attributes.action: Make the sale of fireworks to the public illegal.
attributes.additional_details:
This is to prevent the use of fireworks on other days of the year, ie football celebrations, birthdays etc

To decrease the effects on pets caused by houses setting of fireworks, including heart attacks,illness, anxiety and even death.

To decrease the amount of antisocial behaviour, would stop children and teens getting there hands on fireworks and setting them off in public.

To decrease the amount of damage caused by improper use in public areas.

Decrease the amount of accidents and injury.
attributes.background: Make the sale of fireworks to the public illegal, only licensed displays allowed to purchase and use fireworks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868
